text: @realDonaldTrump You are the worst president in my lifetime & you deserve ZERO credit for anything good happening with this pandemic. Your long denial & downplaying of the #coronavirus, calling it a political Hoax, rejecting WHO tests, lying & weak leadership have cost us thousands of lives.
